frame.name: FR_Expressing_decision
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Speaker</fen> expresses a certain <fen>Decision</fen> they have made, causing it to become binding in a jurisdiction represented by the <fen>Speaker</fen>. This <fen>Decision</fen> may also consist in an <fen>Official_entity</fen> (such as a government or a currency) made official or legitimate by the <fen>Speaker</fen>'s authority in their jurisdiction. <ex></ex> This frames differs from the Ratification frame in that the <fen>Decision</fen> is new, instead of priorily proposed by some other party. It also differs from the FR_Taking_sides frame in that in the FR_Expressing_decision frame, the <fen>Speaker</fen> has the power to cause the <fen>Decision</fen> to be binding.
<ex></ex> <asf>Relation to fndata-1.5</asf> : New frame, created for asfalda. The performative declarations which are encoded in the fndata-1.5 Statement frame are moved to this frame.
<ex></ex> Distinctions with other frames: <ex></ex>
≠ <frframe>Ratification</frframe>: The Ratification frame is a special case of FR_Expressing_decision, in which the decision is the validity of the ratified entity.
<ex></ex>
≠ <frframe>FR_Taking_sides</frframe>: The FR_Expressing_decision is a special case of FR_Taking_sides, in which the Speaker has authority over the approved content, which is thus a decision.
</def-root>

FE.name: Decision
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Decision</fen> identifies what is expressed and decided by the <fen>Speaker</fen>. It can be referred to by decision names, or it can describe the content of the decision (often a future action to be performed). <ex> FR-EX: <fex name="Dec">La saisie définitive</fex> fut <t>prononcée</t> le 1er septembre.</ex> <ex>I now <t>declare</t> <fex name="Decision">you members of this Society</fex> .</ex> <ex>FR-EX: <fex name="Decision">Le juge</fex> se <t>déclare</t> <fex name="Decision">incompétent</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Official_entity
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Official_entity</fen> identifies an entity (such as a government or a currency) made official or legitimate by the <fen>Speaker</fen>'s authority in their jurisdiction. <ex> FR-EX: <fex name="OffE">Les marchés concernés</fex> ont été <t>reconnus</t> par <fex name="Spkr">le ministre de l' économie et des finances</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Speaker
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual or body that expresses the <fen>Decision</fen>, causing it to become binding in a jurisdiction represented by the <fen>Speaker</fen>. <ex>FR-EX: <fex name="Speaker">La commission</fex> <t>déclare</t> <fex name="Decision">le contrat nul et non avenu</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Medium
FE.definition: <def-root>The written or spoken material that contains the <fen>Decision</fen>. </def-root>
